if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerwear") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(ItemID, Amount); }

item.title: Ι ηєє∂ нєℓρ ωιтн му ѕєяνєя
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

open a .cfg file with wordpad or notepad w.e to add npcs you go into autuspawn.cfg and go to the bottom, but above the endonpc thing, and type spawn = Monsterid[Press Tab]XXXX Coords[Press Tab]YYYYCoords[PressTab]Do those zeros, spaced with a tab, e.g spawn = 1 3327 3346 0 0 0 0 0 1 //man

For banks its pretty straight forward, open up client.java press ctrl F, search for makeGlobalObjects, scroll down till you see something likemakeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 6083, 1, 10); // bank You wont see exactly that. lol but thats for the bank, 6083 might be closed bank, if it is closed bank change it to 6084, if you want it facing the other way change the 1 to a 2.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 06:35:23 pm[/size][hr]

Read full topic

item.title: Ι ηєє∂ нєℓρ ωιтн му ѕєяνєя
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Mouse as in one hit k0 weapon? Well you can make ANY weapon 1 hit k0 with the help of item.cfg, open item.cfg search for the item you want, then it has about 15 numbers, the first three are related to prices and the next 12 are the stats, the second last one is the Strength bonus, so change that to… 9999999. No more than that, Now for owner wear and admin wear i think it would go something like this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerwear") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(ItemID, Amount); }

Do that with the adminwear and modwear but change the rights and name, for admin do rights >= 2) { and mods rights >= 1) { plus the rest of the command, you can also do as many items as you want, I just put one there. Make sure you do the item ID not the item name.

Read full topic
item.source: Ι ηєє∂ нєℓρ ωιтн му ѕєяνєя

item.title: Ι ηєє∂ нєℓρ ωιтн му ѕєяνєя
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Ok tony, lets start with the pictures, Use the

1270010026.png765×503

1270010026.png765×503
Ok so you want to change the home area, I think its either in Client.java, Player.java or playerHandler.java, but open up them and search for the X coords that you start at, it should show as something like this:
X = XXXX(X coords<)
Y = YYYY(Y coords<) something like that lol, change the X and Y coords to the coords you want. Compile the server. Moving on, changing the xp it gives you, open up the client.java Search TotelExp and shift your eyes slowly to the left until you see some numbers, change them to the ones you want, Higher for easier training and lower for harder, Now there are more than one set of numbers you gotta change, scroll down abit for the rest you have to change. How do you make commands? What sort of commands? A command that makes you fly/levitate?

[code]}

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) {
        setAnimation(1500);
        playerSE = 1501;
        playerSEW = 1851;
        playerSER = 1851;
        playerSEA = 1851;
        playerEnergy = 99999999;
        playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
        sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149);
        sendMessage("God mode on");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1) {
        sendMessage("god mode off");
        playerSE = 0x328;
        playerSEW = 0x333;
        playerSER = 0x338;
        playerSEA = 0x326;
        playerEnergy = 100;
        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149);
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

[/code] add it in the client.java around all the other commands. Hope this helped you some Enjoy owning a private server!
Oh i almost forgot, How to change what you start out with, open player.java and search Giving your player, it has more after it but we dont need to worry, scroll down abit until you see all these item codes, change them to what stuff you want people to start out with.

Read full topic
